scripts.deploy:build: rm -rf _worker.js && wrangler pages functions build --sourcemap --outdir static/_worker.js --output-routes-path static/_routes.json
scripts.deploy:sourcemaps: export SENTRY_PROJECT=throwaway && export SENTRY_ORG=gregbrimble && sentry-cli sourcemaps inject static/_worker.js && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload static/_worker.js --release=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
